# [Interview #173: COT Signing Report - Sonia Ibarra, Entry #3](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=173#3)

#### Sonia Ibarra

Are
*stedding*
natural, or were they created with the Power like the Far Madding
*ter'angreal*
?

#### Robert Jordan

Read and find out.
